title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 31.1 - Employment of unlicensed solicitors prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 31.1 - Employment of unlicensed solicitors prohibited

State Regulations

No manufacturer or wholesaler shall employ, engage or
permit any person to offer for sale or solicit any order in this State for the
sale of any alcoholic beverage for or on behalf of such manufacturer or
wholesaler, unless such person shall be the holder of a solicitor's permit
authorizing the permittee to represent such manufacturer or
wholesaler. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
31.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
